name: line-chart-series
description: The oj-c-line-chart-series element is used to declare series properties in the seriesTemplate

assignedToY2.description: Defines whether the series is associated with the y2 axis

categories.description: An array of category strings corresponding to the tag cloud items.

color.description: The color of the series. The chart legend item will inherit this color value.

drilling.description: Whether drilling is enabled on the series item.

lineStyle.description: The line style of the data line.

lineType.description: The line type of the data line or area.

lineWidth.description: The width of the data line.

markerShape.description: The shape of the data markers.

markerColor.description: The color of the data markers, if different from the series color.

markerDisplayed.description: Defines whether the data marker is displayed. Only applies to line, area, scatter, and bubble series.

markerSize.description: The size of the data markers.

name.description: The name of the series, displayed in the legend and tooltips.

shortDesc.description: The description of this series. This is used for accessibility and for customizing the tooltip text on the corresponding legend item for the series.

setProperty.description: Sets a property or a single subproperty for complex properties and notifies the component of the change, triggering a corresponding event.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to set. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

params.name: value
params.description: The new value to set the property to.

getProperty.description: Retrieves the value of a property or a subproperty.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to get. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

setProperties.description: Performs a batch set of properties.

params.name: properties
params.description: An object containing the property and value pairs to set.
